attributes.title: Needs updates
attributes.review:
I love my Supreme Leader Donald Trump. I have to say, though, he has failed me with this app... The spinning T when you first download and open the app made me nauseous. The font made my heart skip a beat and my pulse wallow in pain. Painful is the realization that I couldnâ€™t click the phone number button. I wanted to give the leader my number so badly, and I wanted to let my voice be heard. My voice was outnumbered by the voices in my head telling me, â€œPlease remember what you first saw when you opened the app,â€ that dreadful design. I could reminisce on the purpose of the app, on the thought put into making it, but no, this small detail turned me off so badly I just had to write this review. Normally I am so turned on by the thought of Trumpy. ğŸ˜«ğŸ˜– Maybe in future updates you can add an alternative look to the app, like an upside down T instead of a spinning one, because when I think of my president I think of things similar to the shape of a T being upside down. Or maybe instead of a photo of the president at the start you could use a photo of his most notable accomplishment during his presidency: children held forcefully at the border, an act of which has been classified by Holocaust survivors & historical professionals in literal terms as a concentration camp. ( Only kidding, stupid liberal propaganda! ğŸ˜‚) It helps those that download the app to understand what they are getting into... These are some of my suggestions, and I wholeheartedly hope your team takes them into consideration. 

If President Trump reads this, thank you for all you have done. I am truly sorry I have to give this app one star. I love you. I love your son. I love America. I love the Capital. God Bless âœï¸
